content.rendered:
Let Us Do the Work for You

Let our team of conversion experts manage your Sleeknote account, so you have more time to grow your business

Start today
Learn more

More Conversions, Less Hassle

You know that increasing your on-page conversion rate will have a significant impact on your business. But you also know that doing so isn’t always easy – especially when you don’t have the time. We analyzed 15+ billion Sleeknote popups and performed user tests and UX optimization on a large number of websites, so we know what works (and what doesn’t).

That’s why we’ve put together a dedicated team of conversion specialists… 

…who are ready to go above and beyond to make sure your Sleeknote campaigns give you more money in the bank. You tell us your conversion goals and your brand’s vision and identity. Then we’ll do the heavy lifting and implement a tailored strategy to achieve (and surpass) your goals.

Meet Your Conversion Experts

At your service! We’ve put together the optimal team of Sleeknote employees to help you get more sales in less time. Their strengths lay within conversion optimization, brand communication, and design—and if we have to say so ourselves, the perfect people for the job. Let’s meet the A-team

Caroline

Client Advisor

Caroline will ensure you get the most out of your website traffic, turning visitors into leads and sales.

Julie

Dedicated Succes Manager

Julie is your Go-To Copywriter and knows how to get you more quality emails, leads and sales through targeted popups.

Julie Tholstrup

Client Advisor

Julie creates popups for every need and goal. She’ll make sure your popups are always optimized.

Julie Andersen

Dedicated Success Manager

Julie is our data expert. She knows which popups work for every step of the customer journey.

Rikke Thomsen

Dedicated Success Manager

Rikke knows how to get you more quality emails, leads and sales through targeted popups.

Mathias Christensen

Manager

Mathias will help you with the strategic foundation of your conversion goals, and ensure a smooth process.

Camilla

Client Advisor

Camilla creates popups for every need and goal. She’ll make sure your popups are always optimized.

Customer Stories

Instead of us going on about what we can do for you, you can see what our customers have to say about the results we’ve helped them achieve and the difference we’ve made for their business.

Read how Aplus segment their visitors and send relevant and personal emails.

See how Kings & Queens increased their conversion rate by 522,52%

Learn how Anodyne collected more than 23,000 signups for their newsletter in just 4 months.

This Is For You If You Want…

REASON #1

More Qualified Leads

You know collecting qualified leads is important, but you struggle to find time to do so.

REASON #3

Expert Knowledge

You’re looking for a team of conversion experts to plan, execute, and manage your Sleeknote account.

REASON #2

More Time

You don’t have the resources to invest time in increasing conversions for each stage of your marketing funnel.

REASON #4

Higher Conversions

You’re looking for higher conversions so you can make a return on investment for your marketing efforts.

Which Solution Is for You?

We offer different services depending on your wishes and goals. You can see our pre-made packages below, but we also offer custom solutions. Arrange a virtual coffee with Managed Solution Manager, Mathias Christensen, to learn how me might be able to help you.

SleekBox Starter Pack

With the SleekBox Starter Pack, you get three custom-made SleekBoxes specifically tailored to your site. We do this to help you get off to a good start with Sleeknote, and to see what Sleeknote is capable of.

Learn More
Let’s talk

Conversion Packages

Our conversion packages are for you, if you’re looking to gain more insights on how your visitors behave on your site. We also provide you with a custom optimization strategy based on the data we collect from user testing your site.

Learn More
Let’s talk
